entry.message:
[DQC.IFRS.0129.9627] It is expected that ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests with a value of 7,864 reported in the network role http://lenzingaktiengesellschaft.com/xbrl/2020/roles/GewinnVerlust should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, ProfitLoss with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:NoncontrollingInterestsMember and a reported value of -7,864 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://lenzingaktiengesellschaft.com/xbrl/2020/roles/Eigenkapitalveraenderungsrechnung. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests fact are:
Period : 2019-01-01 to 2019-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests : -3 Decimals of ProfitLoss : -3 Rule version: 17.0.0 - https://filings.xbrl.org/529900BKFJBI0QRDJH63/2020-12-31/ESEF/AT/0/lenzingaktiengesellschaft.zip/lenzingaktiengesellschaft/reports/lenzingaktiengesellschaft.xhtml 45541
